item.description:
It would be fun to meet for a few drinks first at Koji and then continue on the rest of the night of dancing and a fun night at Pour house

 

http://www.hellokoji.com/

 

Pourhouse 103 Allyn St

Hartford, CT

pourhousehartford.com

 

Hope to see you there :-D
item.why: It would be easier to find each other at Kojis and then go dancing after a few drinks. I love this club, it has awesome music, with a great DJ . No cover also
item.name: Koji and Pourhouse
